statements: SELECT user_name FROM augmented_reality_user_data;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_preferences FROM augmented_reality_user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_settings FROM augmented_reality_user_data WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_settings FROM augmented_reality_user_data WHERE user_preferences->>'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_preferences->>'theme' AS theme FROM augmented_reality_user_data WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_preferences FROM augmented_reality_user_data WHERE user_settings->'notifications' = 'true';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_preferences->'app_language' AS app_language FROM augmented_reality_user_data WHERE user_settings->>'dark_mode' = 'true';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_settings FROM augmented_reality_user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, ar_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT ar_preferences->>'theme' AS preferred_theme FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, ar_settings->>'language' AS preferred_language FROM user_settings;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT ar_preferences->>'language' as user_language FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id FROM user_preferences JOIN user_settings ON user_preferences.user_id = user_settings.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(ar_preferences->'favorite_movies') as movie FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, ar_pref_1 FROM user_preferences WHERE ar_pref_2 = true;
SELECT ar_setting_1, ar_setting_2 FROM user_settings ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, ar_data_1->'field1' FROM user_data WHERE ar_data_1->>'field2' = 'value';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences JOIN user_settings ON user_preferences.user_id = user_settings.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, ar_pref_1 FROM user_preferences WHERE ar_pref_2 = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, ar_setting_1, ar_data_2 FROM user_settings JOIN user_data ON user_settings.user_id = user_data.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE ar_pref_1 = TRUE AND (ar_pref_2 = FALSE OR user_id LIKE '%4567%');
SELECT user_id, ar_theme FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, ar_intensity, ar_color_scheme FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT ar_experience_rating, ar_usage_history FROM user_data WHERE ar_experience_rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, notification_settings FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM ar_devices WHERE device_type = 'VR' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, ar_theme, ar_intensity FROM user_preferences WHERE ar_intensity > 50;
SELECT user_id, ar_color_scheme FROM user_preferences WHERE ar_color_scheme IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, ar_mode_enabled FROM user_settings WHERE ar_mode_enabled = true;
SELECT ud.user_id, ar_experience_rating, ar_usage_history, device_name FROM user_data ud JOIN ar_devices ad ON ud.user_id = ad.user_id WHERE ar_experience_rating > 4.0 AND device_type = 'AR Glasses';
SELECT * FROM ar_user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_theme FROM ar_user_preferences;
SELECT preferred_language, preferred_theme FROM ar_user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ar_location_data ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT user_id, sync_enabled FROM ar_user_settings WHERE auto_save_settings = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ar_user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_language FROM ar_user_preferences WHERE preferred_theme='Dark';
SELECT * FROM ar_location_data ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_name, os_version FROM ar_device_data WHERE device_type='Mobile' AND os_version='iOS';
SELECT * FROM ar_session_data WHERE end_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
